summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StudentsNet application including registration, UPI payment flow, login, and dashboard functionality. All core features working correctly with minor backend issues identified.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Semantic difference only - both indicate unauthorized access

minor_bugs.issue: Allows duplicate payment submissions for users with pending status
minor_bugs.impact: Users can submit multiple payment proofs, but doesn't break core functionality

passed_tests: User registration with all required fields
Payment page displays correct amount (â‚¹299) and UPI QR code
Payment form submission with transaction ID and screenshot upload
Payment pending page display and verification message
Login flow with payment status-based redirects
Dashboard access protection for unpaid/pending users
API endpoints: register, login, profile, students, payment/status, payment/submit-upi
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix duplicate payment submission issue: Add check for payment_status='pending' in /api/payment/submit-upi endpoint to prevent multiple submissions. Optional: Change unauthorized profile response from 403 to 401 for consistency.
